node.title: Student allegedly confronted with death threat as anti-vaxxer presence at schools ramps up
node.description: WA's Education Minister slams "gutless" and "intimidating" anti-vax protesters who are holding rallies at schools around the state, after allegations a protester confronted a student and told them, "I might as well shoot you now".
node.content:
["WA's Education Minister has slammed \"gutless\"\u00a0and '\"intimidating\"\u00a0anti-vaccination protesters who have held rallies at schools around the state, after allegations a protester confronted a student and told them \"I might as well shoot you now\".", "Protests have ramped up around Western Australia, as the state government pushes ahead with its COVID-19 vaccination roll-out and prepares to introduce mandatory jabs for much of the workforce.", "Education Minister Sue Ellery said she had heard reports of \"extremist\"\u00a0behaviour at a Perth school.", "\"There was an incident yesterday at metropolitan school where there was a protester out the front engaged in a conversation with a student, it's alleged, and as part of\u00a0that conversation the protester said words to the effect of 'well I might as well shoot you now',\" Ms Ellery said.", "", "
The anti-vax protesters have turned up at Margaret River Senior High School already twice this week.(ABC South West)
", "\"That is outrageous to be making that kind of comment to a school student.", "\"Holding a peaceful protest is one thing, intimidating and threatening children is really pathetic, it's gutless.\"", "She said police were looking into the incident and other reports of unruly protest behaviour.", "
Calls for buffer zones around WA schools
", "Twice this week, protesters have gathered outside\u00a0Margaret River Senior High School, prompting calls from parents for buffer zones\u00a0at schools, similar to laws introduced earlier this year to prevent picketing near abortion clinics.", "Misti Lyness has kids at Margaret River High and was uncomfortable with kids being targeted.", "\"I would like to see buffer zones at all of the schools so children can safely enter without being coerced or harassed in any way,\" she said.", "", "
Police had to attend a protest outside the high school in WA's South West.(ABC South West)
", "\"I just wondered if a buffer zone might give police more power to move people on, there's so many places to protest, there's a park just 50 metres away from the school, and that's a great place where we would have protests,\" she said.", "Margaret River grandmother Lisa Chatwin said she had written to WA's police minister in\u00a0support of the move and said it was not just about vaccinations.", "\"At the moment, the national conversation and debate is about vaccination but I mean that can change at any time.\u00a0", "Police Minister Paul Papalia said he had received correspondence highlighting concern about the protests, and referred it to WA Police for action.", "
Premier 'appalled' at 'deranged'\u00a0protests
", "WA Premier Mark McGowan slammed the behaviour of anti-vaccination protesters who had targeted students getting their COVID-19 vaccinations.", "\"It's deranged, it's outrageous, it's selfish,\" he said.", "\"Harassing kids at their schools or in shopping centres is not the Australian way.", "\"This kind of conduct is verging on urban terrorism.\"", "
Anti-vax principal being investigated
", "Meanwhile, Ms\u00a0Ellery said she was investigating reports the principal of a private college in Perth's south had threatened to shut down his school rather than get the COVID-19 jab.", "Ms Ellery said she had also sought advice on whether the principal could be stripped of his teacher's registration.", "", "
WA Education Minister Sue Ellery says harassment from anti-vaxxers needed to stop.(ABC News: Evelyn Manfield)
", "\"This is a school principal who holds a position of privilege and power effectively abusing that position with his own personal views against the public health advice,\" Ms Ellery said.", "Ms Ellery said she had sought advice about whether the principal had\u00a0breached standards under the Teacher\u00a0Registration Board.\u00a0", "\"I think this conduct is unconscionable,\" she said.", "\"He has frightened his staff by threatening their jobs, and he has frightened his school community and the parents by suggesting to them their children will no longer be able to attend this school.\"", "
School protests 'cause for concern'
", "Head of the WA Council for State School Organisations Pania Turner said school protests were an emerging issue that was \"absolutely a cause for concern\" if they caused stress for students and their families.", "", "
WACSSO president\u00a0Pania Turner says students should be able to go to school without being harassed.(ABC News: Supplied)
", "\"This is a new thing that we're seeing and something that we're watching closely,\" she said.", "\"I do know that parents will be quite concerned if the situation that happened in Margaret River becomes a regular or an increasing thing around our schools.", "\"We will be working with the department to explore all options to ensure that students can enjoy their learning and enjoy going to school without being harassed.\""]
